title: Brand Collaboration – Rate Card
content: Base rate: $1,200 per sponsored video. Includes 1x 30–60 sec integration, 1 revision. Additional deliverables available upon request.

title: Email Reply – New Brand Inquiry Template
content: Thanks so much for reaching out! I'm excited to hear about the opportunity. Could you share details about deliverables, timeline, and budget so I can provide accurate rates?

title: Creator Collaboration Guidelines
content: When collaborating with other creators, maintain mutual brand safety, align on content themes, and establish clear expectations for posting timelines.

title: Press/Media Interview Requirements
content: For press interviews: request questions in advance, confirm usage rights, and ensure creator brand alignment with the publication.

title: Spam & Phishing Rules
content: If the sender domain is unknown, contains suspicious keywords, or includes unsolicited links, classify as spam and set priority to P4.
